channel.title: Proposals on Apache Comdev
channel.description: Recent content in Proposals on Apache Comdev

item.title: Zest Proposal
item.description: Abstract ¶ qi4j = new Energy4Java(); That is how to create the Qi4j runtime, and it captures the essence of its spirit. Qi4j is a platform to develop Composite Oriented Programming applications in Java in a new, exciting and productive manner. Governance of Provisional Top Level Project ¶ Provisional Top Level Project is a new idea at the ASF, and the Qi4j community is willing to try the idea, instead of simply debating it.
